step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your arms in front of your chest and making fists. Try to tighten your muscles a bit more as you inhale.
Excellent! You're opening your fingers and extending your arms horizontally. Remember to relax your muscles as you exhale.
Great work on this step. Ensure your elbows are not too high or too low, aiming for shoulder height.
You're doing well with the arm extension. Focus on a smooth, controlled movement and maintaining shoulder height.
Nice finish! You're completing the repetitions effectively. Keep up the good work with the muscle relaxation on the exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arms at shoulder height and focus on tightening your muscles when you inhale and relaxing them when you exhale.
